Serialized Form

  • Package com.berbils.game.entities

    • Class com.berbils.game.entities.FireEngine extends BoxGameEntity implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentWater

          int currentWater
          The current water left in the fire engine, once this reaches zero it can no longer fire

        • maxWater

          int maxWater
          The maximum water the fire engine holds, this is what it starts off with when it is spawned or reset

        • currentHealth

          int currentHealth
          The current health of the fire engine, once this reaches zero the fire engine "dies" and the onDeath() method is called

        • speed

          float speed
          A constant speed multiplier used by the InputManager to change the amount of force applied and therefore the speed

        • originalSpeedLimit

          float originalSpeedLimit
          A constant speed multiplier used by the InputManager to change the amount of force applied and therefore the speed

        • leftFireStation

          boolean leftFireStation
          A boolean value used in conjuction with the @FireStation class to determine whether the player should interact with the Fire Station

        • onFireStation

          boolean onFireStation
          A boolean that determines whether F can be pressed to enter the fire station.

        • textureFilePath

          java.lang.String textureFilePath

        • originalWeapon

          Weapon originalWeapon

        • maxHealth

          int maxHealth
          The maximum health the fire engine can have, this is what it starts off with when it is spawned or reset

        • invincible

          boolean invincible

        • weapon

          Weapon weapon
          The Weapon class instance assigned to the fire engine allowing it to the @fire method and attack

        • isAlive

          boolean isAlive
          A boolean used to check whether the fire engine is "alive" to determine whether it should be despawned and destroyed.Is also required to prevent multiple accidental onDeath() calls

          The world attached the body would be created on and is attached to the screen

          The entities Box2D body

        • entityBodyDefinition

          BodyDef entityBodyDefinition
          The Entities Box2D current body definition

        • entityFixture

          Fixture entityFixture
          The Entities Box2D fixture

        • entityFixtureDefinition

          FixtureDef entityFixtureDefinition
          The Entities Box2D current fixture definition

        • isStatic

          boolean isStatic
          A boolean stating whether the Box2D body is static (For true) or Dynamic (For false)

        • userData

          java.lang.Object userData
          The object attached to body and fixture userData

        • entityShape

          Shape entityShape
          The shape of the entity

        • spriteHandler

          SpriteHandler spriteHandler
          The spritehandler attached to the screen

        • entitySprite

          Sprite entitySprite
          The entities sprite

        • spriteLayer

          int spriteLayer
          The draw layer the sprite will be drawn on, used to determine draw order. 0 Is the bottom layer

        • catBits

          short catBits
          The category bits used for Box2D collision filtering

        • maskBits

          short maskBits
          The mask bits used for Box2D collision filtering

        • serialReady

          boolean serialReady

        • entityTexture

          Texture entityTexture
          The entities texture, set to null if the entity doesn't need a sprite

        • angDamp

          float angDamp
          linear and angular dampening

        • linDamp

          float linDamp

        • type

          java.lang.String type
          type of sensor, used only for the alienpatrol instances

  • Package com.berbils.game.entities.patrols

    • Class com.berbils.game.entities.patrols.AlienPatrol extends BoxGameEntity implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • timeDead

          float timeDead

        • respawnTime

          float respawnTime

        • isRunning

          boolean isRunning
          Boolean for determining whether the patrol has been hit by water and should be running away.

        • tower

          Tower tower
          The tower the patrol belongs to, and whether or not that tower is still alive

        • isActive

          boolean isActive
          The boolean for telling the patrol whether a target is within it's alert range

        • isAngry

          boolean isAngry
          The boolean for telling the patrol whether it is busy attacking a target

        • isAlive

          boolean isAlive
          Boolean for determining whether the patrol should be destroyed The second one refers to whether all death functions have been completed already

        • hasHitFireEng

          boolean hasHitFireEng

        • hasReset

          boolean hasReset

        • isDead

          boolean isDead

        • isMoving

          boolean isMoving
          Boolean for determining whether the patrol is currently moving in any direction or standing still.

        • passivePatrolTexture

          java.lang.String passivePatrolTexture
          The file path to the texture for when the patrol is just chilling

        • alertPatrolTexture

          java.lang.String alertPatrolTexture
          the file path to the texture for when the patrol noticed someone

        • angryPatrolTexture

          java.lang.String angryPatrolTexture
          the file paths for the animation when the patrol is rushing to the player

        • alertSensor

          AlertSensor alertSensor
          Two circles that define where the patrol stops and notices a truck and where the patrol rushes to attack a truck.

        • angrySensor

          AngrySensor angrySensor

        • alertRange

          float alertRange
          The range that the patrol can alert in and attack in

        • angryRange

          float angryRange

        • speed

          float speed
          speed stat

        • towerAlive

          java.lang.Boolean towerAlive

        • moveLoc

          Vector2 moveLoc
          The current location the patrol is moving towards directly

        • timeToStop

          int timeToStop
          The amount of time until the patrol will stop moving

        • timeToMove

          int timeToMove

        • timeToBeAngry

          int timeToBeAngry

    • Class com.berbils.game.entities.projectilespawner.SpokeProjectileSpawner extends Weapon implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • startPosIncrement

          float startPosIncrement
          The angle that the spawner will move by each time an attack call is made, increasing it would increase the distance between the projecties of two attack calls

        • increment

          float increment
          The interval between each spawn point angle direction

        • startPos

          float startPos
          The angle which the projectiles will start creating intervals from Stores how far round the circle the projectiles will spawn

        • noOfSpawnPoints

          int noOfSpawnPoints
          The number of spokes or points at which a projectile will spawn per attack call

    • Class com.berbils.game.entities.projectilespawner.Weapon extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • startTime

          long startTime
          The last time the weapon called fired (called the attack method)

        • fireDelay

          double fireDelay
          The amount of time required where the weapon can not attack, to match the fire rate per second

        • projectileType

          Projectiles projectileType
          The projectile type that the weapon will spawn

        • projectileSpeed

          float projectileSpeed
          The speed at which the projectile travels in meters

        • maxRange

          float maxRange
          The max distance in meters the projectile can travel before being destroyed, acting the same as if it had collided

          int damage
          The damage each projectile does on collision

        • projectileInitialSpawnPoints

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> projectileInitialSpawnPoints
          A HashMap for keeping track of a projectiles initial spawn point so that if they travel outside of their max range they can be destroyed

  • Package com.berbils.game.entities.towers

    • Class com.berbils.game.entities.towers.Tower extends CircleGameEntity implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • patrols

          AlienPatrol[] patrols
          the list of alien patrols it has currently spawned

        • numOfPatrols

          int numOfPatrols

        • timeTillSpawn

          int timeTillSpawn

        • healthBar

          Sprite healthBar
          The sprite for the healthbar displaed above the tower

        • towerWeapon

          Weapon towerWeapon
          The weapon object the tower will use to spawn projectiles

        • isActive

          boolean isActive
          The boolean for telling the tower whether it has a target and can fire (if also alive), also used for determining which texture the tower needs currently.

        • isAlive

          boolean isAlive
          Boolean for determining whether the fire engine is alive or not alive and should be destroyed

        • dead

          boolean dead

        • currentTarget

          Body currentTarget
          The current target for teh tower to fire at, if null the tower is automatically set to not active

        • engagedTowerTextureFP

          java.lang.String engagedTowerTextureFP
          The file path to the texture for when the tower has a target

        • disengagedTowerTextureFP

          java.lang.String disengagedTowerTextureFP
          The file path to the texture for when the tower does not have a target

        • towerSensor

          CircleGameEntity towerSensor
          The tower sensor, a circle sensor the size of the tower range, it is used for determining whether a target is within a certain distance of the tower and can therefore be attacked

        • range

          float range
          The range that the tower can attack within, in meters

        • currentHealth

          float currentHealth
          The current health of the tower, once this reaches zero the tower "dies" and the onDeath() method is called

        • maxHealth

          float maxHealth
          The max health for the Tower instance and represents the maximum amount of damage the Tower can take before death

        • healthBarPos

          Vector2 healthBarPos
          The position of the healthBar in meters

        • healthBarSize

          Vector2 healthBarSize
          The size of the healthbar in meters

        • explosionOnDeath

          Explosion explosionOnDeath
          The explosion class object used to create an explosion upon tower death
